markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 3+"
    pfs=""
>
[Presentable](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1389)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Enchantment" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=61" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 89</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** applied to any visible article of clothing

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

A garment with this rune is always clean, as though it had just been affected by [_prestidigitation_](/Spells.aspx?ID=229). You gain a +1 item bonus to [Make an Impression](/Actions.aspx?ID=50) on those who would be impressed by a particular _presentable_ outfit while wearing this garment.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

level="2"

Presentable
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Price** 50 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 10"
pfs="Standard"
>
Presentable (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 89</row>

**Price** 900 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

This rune grants a +2 item bonus and has an activation.

<document level="2" id="action-1074" />
name: Presentable (Greater)
